<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get User Insights"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/insights/userprofiles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve user insights from the LoginRadius Cloud Directory based on the provided parameters.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"apikey","in":"query","description":"LoginRadius API Key","required":true,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"apisecret","in":"query","description":"LoginRadius API Secret with Analytics API permissions enabled","required":true,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Query parameters for user insights","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"from":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The start date for the records you would like to retrieve (yyyy-mm-dd)"},"to":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The end date for the records you would like to retrieve (yyyy-mm-dd)"},"q":{"type":"object","description":"The query to filter data. Details on query format can be found in the documentation."}},"required":["from","to","q"]},"example":{"from":"2024-01-01","to":"2024-01-31","q":{}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A JSON object containing user insights data","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"total":{"type":"integer","example":403,"description":"Total records retrieved"},"aggregations":{"type":"object","properties":{"userperyear":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"integer"},"example":{"RAAS":370,"google":24,"twitter":6,"facebook":3},"description":"Aggregated user data by provider"}}}}},"example":{"total":403,"aggregations":{"userperyear":{"RAAS":370,"google":24,"twitter":6,"facebook":3}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request. Check the query parameters and request body."},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized. Ensure the API key and secret are valid."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
